name: Fever Garden
description:
The roots of the fungus attack your garden continually! You have to protect them to make them bear more fruit. The time will run after you. Hurry up! Get the highest score and don't let your plants die. Use the right toolbox, the fate of plant life is in your hands.

Toolbox Instruction: (Click them to use)

  • Watering Pot -> Hover the plant that needs watering
  • Scissor -> Hover the Enoki Mushroom to kill
  • Hammer -> Click 3 times the Umbrella Mushroom to kill
  • Rag -> Press and hold the Brown Mushroom to kill
  • Glove (Berry Picker) -> Click the plant with berries to pick them
  • Berry Seed -> Click any area to plant a new tree

Credit:

  • Achmad Jodhy A. E. - Game Designer
  • Ginanjar Agus. W. - Programmer
  • Mijil Satria P. - Sound Designer
  • Feraro Rizal D. W. - 2D Artist
